tool_description: Filters book lists by one or multiple genres, with options for inclusive or exclusive filtering.

book_ids.description: Array of book IDs to filter

genres.description: Array of genres to filter by

filter_mode.description: Filter mode: inclusive (match any genre) or exclusive (match all genres)

exclude_genres.description: Array of genres to exclude from results

error_messages: Empty book_ids array: Provide at least one book ID to filter.
Empty genres array: Provide at least one genre for filtering.
Unknown genre: One or more genres are not recognized in our database.
No books match criteria: All books were filtered out by the specified genre criteria.
usage: Provide book_ids array and genres array for filtering. Use filter_mode to specify whether books should match any or all genres. Use exclude_genres to remove specific genres from results.

filtered_book_ids.description: Array of book IDs that match the genre criteria

books_remaining.description: Number of books that passed the filter

applied_filters.description: Summary of genre filters that were applied
